an5.38:1.3: Ye te, bhikkhave, loke santo sappurisa te saddhanneva pathamam anukampanta anukampanti, no tatha assaddham;
an5.38:1.4: saddhanneva pathamam upasankamanta upasankamanti, no tatha assaddham;
an5.38:1.5: saddhanneva pathamam patigganhanta patigganhanti, no tatha assaddham;
an5.38:1.6: saddhanneva pathamam dhammam desenta desenti, no tatha assaddham;
an5.38:1.7: saddho kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
an5.38:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca saddhe kulaputte anisamsa.
an5.38:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, subhumiyam catumahapathe mahanigrodho samanta pakkhinam patisaranam hoti;
an5.38:2.2: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, saddho kulaputto bahuno janassa patisaranam hoti bhikkhunam bhikkhuninam upasakanam upasikananti.
